titles.title: A resolution designating December 14, 2013, as "Wreaths Across America Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
12/13/2013--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates December 14, 2013, as Wreaths Across America Day.
Honors the Wreaths Across America project, the Patriot Guard Riders, and all of the volunteers and donors involved in the tradition of placing holiday wreaths at national cemeteries and veterans' memorials.
Recognizes the sacrifices made by veterans, members of the Armed Forces, and their families.
